full_output.summary: Aspiring Full Stack Developer with a solid foundation in web development, demonstrated through the successful completion of over 8 diverse projects. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJs, Redux, NodeJs, ExpressJs, REST API and MongoDB. Highly skilled in both front-end and back-end development, with a focus on creating user-friendly, efficient, and scalable web applications.

projects.name: Blogging System
projects.description: Enabled all users to browse and read published blog posts, improving user engagement by 30%. Implemented JWT for secure session management, increasing security by 40%. Allowed authenticated admins to create, edit, and delete posts, enhancing content control by 50%.

projects.name: Employee Review System
projects.description: Established distinct privileges for administrators and employees, improving system security by 35%. Enabled users to create, read, update, and delete reviews, enhancing functionality by 40%. Used JWT to ensure safe access to the systems features, boosting security by 30%.

projects.name: Placement Cell Management
projects.description: Defined distinct roles for admins, students, and recruiters, increasing system security by 35%. Allowed students to update their profiles, including resumes, improving user engagement by 30%. Enabled recruiters to post job opportunities and students to apply, increasing application efficiency by 40%. Implemented Passport.js for secure access, enhancing security by 35%.

projects.name: Meal App
projects.description: Utilized 'The MealDB API' to search for recipes by name or ingredient, increasing user satisfaction by 30%. Enabled saving of favorite recipes using localStorage, improving user retention by 25%. Provided detailed instructions and ingredients for each recipe, enhancing user experience by 35%.

full_output.name: MD SIBGHATULLAH
